title: The Gentlemen (TV Series) (2024)
description: Season 1. Episode 5. Eddie Horniman inherits a family estate, initially unaware its home to a drug empire run by a syndicate that has no plans to vacate. Created by Guy Ritchie.

title: Ken Carson - Fighting My Demons (2023)
description: The music video for "Fighting My Demons" by Ken Carson, directed by Cole Bennett, was released in 2023 and features unique, glitchy visuals. The video presents a series of grainy, 3D footage that gives off the impression of being shot with night-vision goggles, offering a surreal viewing experience. It mainly showcases Ken Carson partying and performing his lyrics, creating a montage that aligns with the song's themes. The video's eerie and dark aesthetics were noted for drawing inspiration from the style of 1990s Japanese cinema, culminating in a profound, existential moment where Ken faces a haunting black void, adding depth and narrative to the visual experience.

title: Rema - Trouble Maker (2023)
description: The "Trouble Maker" music video by Rema, directed by Meji Alabi, features vibrant visuals and dynamic choreography that emphasize themes of triumph and resilience. Enhanced by Blaisebeatz's production, it provides a cinematic experience that complements the track's infectious beats. The video showcases Rema's unique style and artistic versatility.
